title: Drawing, "Mount Chimborazo at Sunset", 1857
inscribed: In graphite, along bottom right margin: 2 - Dazzling from sun / 3 Warm lakyneutral / 4 Cooler and darker / 5 red orange light 6 shadow dark blue purple with blue lights / 7 Dark laky brown very dark / 8 Dark purple laky-tender/9 Brown purple X Brilliantly lighted with orange. Lower middle left: Chimborazo / July 13th, 57 / 10 top gilt with the sun / sky grayish and warm / 11 Dark cool purple
description: Horizontal view with the Peak at right. The sun is just above mountain range. High clouds in left distance and in right sky.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Mount Chimborazo at Sunset", 1857.
1857. Graphite on tan wove paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-1337.
